name: lambda-auth0-authenticator
description: An AWS Lambda function to provide a Custom Authenticator for AWS API Gateway that verifies RS* signed tokens

scripts.bundle-stage-output: mkdir -p output/ && cp package.json package-lock.json output/
scripts.bundle-install-deps: npm run build-local-deps && npm run bundle-stage-output && cd output/ && npm ci --omit=dev && npm run bundle-copy-local-deps && cd ..
scripts.bundle: npm run clean && npm run bundle-install-deps && cp *.js *.json output/
scripts.start: npm run build-local-deps && lambda-local --timeout 300 --lambda-path index.js --event-path event.json
